Vuforia Samples
About SightsAR

SightsAR app was developed under the thesis of postgraduate programme Master of Science (MSc) in Web Intelligence‚Äù (http://msc.it.teithe.gr). AR app implements Augmented Reality so as to identify historical monuments in the city of Thessaloniki.

More specifically, the application will recognize real-time historical monuments and provide the user with information about the monument he is currently viewing with the camera of the mobile phone. The information includes a collection of images and historical information about the current monument.
How to Use the App
SightsAR uses Vuforia SDK to augment the real world
It is based on image targets module
In order to use the app you can donwnload the targets or scan the current monument:\n Dropbox: \n https://www.dropbox.com/sh/8j4b2hiive2gk0a/AAD9cVYkOCdv6kZ3O-zSENbIa?dl=0
In order to access to the saved files, go to the device Inside storage (SDCard) and find Targetsinformations folder.
